00039 #include "c6x.h"
00040 #include "string.h" // for memset
00041 #include "dataMoveCtrsm.h"
00042 #include "defCC66.h"
00043 
00044 // get inverse of 2x2 lower triangular matrix
00045 void inverse2x2LowerC(complex * restrict src, int ld, int flagDiagisU)
00046 {
00047   __float2_t v00, v10;
00048   __float2_t v11;
00049   __float2_t *pSrc = (__float2_t *) src;
00050 
00051   if(flagDiagisU)
00052   {
00053         pSrc[0] = _ftof2(0.0f, 1.0f);
00054         v10 = pSrc[1];
00055         pSrc[1] = _ftof2(-_hif(v10),-_lof(v10));
00056         pSrc[ld] = _ftof2(0.0f, 0.0f);
00057         pSrc[ld+1] = _ftof2(0.0f, 1.0f);
00058   }
00059   else
00060   {
00061         __float2_t v00s, v11s, tempf2, tempf2a;
00062         __x128_t     temp128;
00063         float      tempf;
00064 
00065         v00 = pSrc[0];
00066         v10 = pSrc[1];
00067     v11 = pSrc[ld+1];
00068     v00s = _dmpysp(v00,v00);
00069     v11s = _dmpysp(v11,v11);
00070     tempf = 1.0f/((_lof(v00s)+_hif(v00s))*(_lof(v11s)+_hif(v11s)));
00071     temp128 = _cmpysp(v00,v11);
00072     tempf2 = _dmpysp(_ftof2(-tempf, -tempf),_daddsp(_lof2_128(temp128),_hif2_128(temp128)));
00073     tempf2 = _ftof2(_lof(tempf2),_hif(tempf2));
00074     temp128 = _cmpysp(tempf2,v11);
00075     tempf2a = _daddsp(_lof2_128(temp128),_hif2_128(temp128));
00076     pSrc[0] = _ftof2(_lof(tempf2a),-_hif(tempf2a));
00077 
00078     temp128 = _cmpysp(tempf2,v10);
00079     tempf2a = _daddsp(_lof2_128(temp128),_hif2_128(temp128));
00080     pSrc[1] = _ftof2(-_lof(tempf2a),_hif(tempf2a));
00081 
00082     pSrc[ld] = _ftof2(0.0f, 0.0f);
00083 
00084     temp128 = _cmpysp(tempf2,v00);
00085     tempf2a = _daddsp(_lof2_128(temp128),_hif2_128(temp128));
00086     pSrc[ld+1] = _ftof2(_lof(tempf2a),-_hif(tempf2a));
00087 
00088   }
00089 }
00090 
00091 // get inverse of 2x2 upper triangular matrix
00092 inverse2x2Upper(complex * restrict src, int ld, int flagDiagisU)
00093 {
00094           __float2_t v00;
00095           __float2_t v01, v11;
00096           __float2_t *pSrc = (__float2_t *) src;
00097 
00098           if(flagDiagisU)
00099           {
00100                 pSrc[0] = _ftof2(0.0f, 1.0f);
00101                 pSrc[1] = _ftof2(0.0f, 0.0f);
00102                 v01 = pSrc[ld];
00103                 pSrc[ld] = _ftof2(-_hif(v01),-_lof(v01));
00104                 pSrc[ld+1] = _ftof2(0.0f, 1.0f);
00105           }
00106           else
00107           {
00108                 __float2_t v00s, v11s, tempf2, tempf2a;
00109                 __x128_t     temp128;
00110                 float      tempf;
00111 
00112                 v00 = pSrc[0];
00113             v01 = pSrc[ld];
00114             v11 = pSrc[ld+1];
00115             v00s = _dmpysp(v00,v00);
00116             v11s = _dmpysp(v11,v11);
00117             tempf = 1.0f/((_lof(v00s)+_hif(v00s))*(_lof(v11s)+_hif(v11s)));
00118             temp128 = _cmpysp(v00,v11);
00119             tempf2 = _dmpysp(_ftof2(-tempf, -tempf),_daddsp(_lof2_128(temp128),_hif2_128(temp128)));
00120             tempf2 = _ftof2(_lof(tempf2),_hif(tempf2));
00121             temp128 = _cmpysp(tempf2,v11);
00122             tempf2a = _daddsp(_lof2_128(temp128),_hif2_128(temp128));
00123             pSrc[0] = _ftof2(_lof(tempf2a),-_hif(tempf2a));
00124 
00125             pSrc[1] = _ftof2(0.0f, 0.0f);
00126 
00127             temp128 = _cmpysp(tempf2,v01);
00128             tempf2a = _daddsp(_lof2_128(temp128),_hif2_128(temp128));
00129             pSrc[ld] = _ftof2(-_lof(tempf2a),_hif(tempf2a));
00130 
00131 
00132             temp128 = _cmpysp(tempf2,v00);
00133             tempf2a = _daddsp(_lof2_128(temp128),_hif2_128(temp128));
00134             pSrc[ld+1] = _ftof2(_lof(tempf2a),-_hif(tempf2a));
00135 
00136           }
00137 }
00138 
00139 void arrangeDataUACtrsm(complex * restrict ptrA, int kLoc, int mCnt, int kCnt, int flagDiagisU)
00140 {
00141   int cnt, diagCnt;
00142   int iValue, jValue;
00143   // zero out above diagonal
00144   if(kLoc < -mCnt)
00145   {
00146           return;
00147   }
00148   else if(kLoc < 0)
00149   {
00150         iValue = 0;
00151         jValue = kCnt+kLoc;
00152         diagCnt = mCnt+kLoc;
00153   }
00154   else if(kLoc < kCnt-mCnt)
00155   {
00156         iValue = 0;
00157         jValue = kCnt-mCnt-kLoc;
00158         diagCnt = mCnt;
00159   }
00160   else if(kLoc < kCnt)
00161   {
00162         iValue = kCnt-kLoc-mCnt;
00163         jValue = 0;
00164         diagCnt = mCnt-iValue;
00165   }
00166   else
00167   {
00168         return;
00169   }
00170 
00171   if(jValue < 0) jValue = 0;
00172   if(iValue < 0) iValue = 0;
00173   for(cnt=0;cnt<diagCnt;cnt+=M_KERNEL_C)
00174   {
00175         inverse2x2Upper(ptrA+(jValue+cnt)*MPARTITION_C+iValue+cnt, MPARTITION_C, flagDiagisU);
00176   }
00177   return;
00178 }
00179 
00180 void arrangeDataLTACtrsm(complex * restrict ptrA, int kLoc, int mCnt, int kCnt, int flagDiagisU)
00181 {
00182   int cnt, diagCnt;
00183   int iValue, jValue;
00184   // zero out above diagonal
00185   if(kLoc < -mCnt)
00186   {
00187           return;
00188   }
00189   else if(kLoc < 0)
00190   {
00191         iValue = 0;
00192         jValue = kCnt+kLoc;
00193         diagCnt = mCnt+kLoc;
00194   }
00195   else if(kLoc < kCnt-mCnt)
00196   {
00197         iValue = 0;
00198         jValue = kCnt-mCnt-kLoc;
00199         diagCnt = mCnt;
00200   }
00201   else if(kLoc < kCnt)
00202   {
00203         iValue = kCnt-kLoc-mCnt;
00204         jValue = 0;
00205         diagCnt = mCnt-iValue;
00206   }
00207   else
00208   {
00209         return;
00210   }
00211 
00212   if(jValue < 0) jValue = 0;
00213   if(iValue < 0) iValue = 0;
00214   for(cnt=0;cnt<diagCnt;cnt+=M_KERNEL_C)
00215   {
00216         inverse2x2LowerC(ptrA+(iValue+cnt)*KPARTITION_C+jValue+cnt, KPARTITION_C, flagDiagisU);
00217   }
00218   return;
00219 }
00220 
00221 void arrangeDataLACtrsm(complex * restrict ptrA, int kLoc, int mCnt, int kCnt, int flagDiagisU)
00222 {
00223   int cnt, diagCnt;
00224   int iValue, jValue;
00225   // zero out below diagonal
00226   if(kLoc <= 0)
00227   {
00228           return;
00229   }
00230   else if(kLoc <= mCnt)
00231   {
00232         iValue = 0;
00233         jValue = kCnt-kLoc;
00234         diagCnt = kLoc;
00235   }
00236   else if(kLoc <= kCnt)
00237   {
00238         iValue = 0;
00239         jValue = kCnt-kLoc;
00240         diagCnt = mCnt;
00241   }
00242   else if(kLoc <= kCnt+mCnt)
00243   {
00244         iValue = kLoc-kCnt;
00245         jValue = 0;
00246         diagCnt = kCnt+mCnt-kLoc;
00247   }
00248   else
00249   {
00250         return;
00251   }
00252 
00253   if(jValue < 0) jValue = 0;
00254   if(iValue < 0) iValue = 0;
00255   for(cnt=0;cnt<diagCnt;cnt+=M_KERNEL_C)
00256   {
00257         inverse2x2LowerC(ptrA+(jValue+cnt)*MPARTITION_C+iValue+cnt, MPARTITION_C, flagDiagisU);
00258   }
00259   return;
00260 }
00261 
00262 void arrangeDataUTACtrsm(complex * restrict ptrA, int kLoc, int mCnt, int kCnt, int flagDiagisU)
00263 {
00264   int cnt, diagCnt;
00265   int iValue, jValue;
00266   // zero out below diagonal
00267   if(kLoc <= 0)
00268   {
00269           return;
00270   }
00271   else if(kLoc <= mCnt)
00272   {
00273         iValue = 0;
00274         jValue = kCnt-kLoc;
00275         diagCnt = kLoc;
00276   }
00277   else if(kLoc <= kCnt)
00278   {
00279         iValue = 0;
00280         jValue = kCnt-kLoc;
00281         diagCnt = mCnt;
00282   }
00283   else if(kLoc <= kCnt+mCnt)
00284   {
00285         iValue = kLoc-kCnt;
00286         jValue = 0;
00287         diagCnt = kCnt+mCnt-kLoc;
00288   }
00289   else
00290   {
00291         return;
00292   }
00293 
00294   if(jValue < 0) jValue = 0;
00295   if(iValue < 0) iValue = 0;
00296   for(cnt=0;cnt<diagCnt;cnt+=M_KERNEL_C)
00297   {
00298         inverse2x2Upper(ptrA+(iValue+cnt)*KPARTITION_C+jValue+cnt, KPARTITION_C, flagDiagisU);
00299   }
00300   return;
00301 }
